Open Source Projects

Over the years, I’ve written numerous open source libraries. The main ones are:

  • Waves, a Ruby framework for Web applications
  • DateJS, an advanced JavaScript date library
  • Autocode, a Ruby library for on-demand code loading and generation
  • Functor, a Ruby library for pattern-based function / method dispatch

Note that, oddly, none of the reference implementations for these libraries are actually in my own personal github repo.

This work by Dan Yoder is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. The name “rocket.ly” was Maia's idea. :-)
